transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan ji sir main bol raha hun madam.
Hello?
Executive: Haan ji sir.
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Ah, maine jo aapne IndiaMART pe account banaya hai.
Executive: Haan ji, ye Rudra Trading Company.
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji, haan ji.
Executive: Ji sir. To us pe maine requirement abhi requirement aani shuru ho gayi hai madam.
Executive: Haan sir iske liye na aapka jo catalog abhi live process mein hai na to iske iske liye hum aapke liye welcome call arrange karte hain. To abhi aapki welcome call assign nahi hui hai. Welcome call jaise arrange hoti hai wo aapka jab live ho jata hai catalog na do se teen din mein welcome call hamare end se arrange ki jati hai. To usme aapko aapki services ke bare mein aur kaise use karna hai, kaise aapko buyleads kitni di jayengi, lead manager kya hota hai, sari cheeze jo jo IndiaMART wala app hai na uske regarding sab kuch aapko interaction diya jata hai ki kaise kaise use karna hai aapko, theek hai? To wo abhi sir abhi tak live nahi hua apna.
Executive: Sir catalog abhi aap check kar rahe hain aapne buyleads vagaira bhi consume karna start kar diya hai dekh lijiye.
Customer: Achha achha.
Executive: Aapne aaj ki date mein aaj ki date mein aapne buylead bhi consume kiya hai. To abhi catalog aapka live ho gaya hai but introduction jo hota hai na ek hamare end se welcome call kehte hain wo introduction hota hai ek. To usme kya hota hai aapko hum samjhate hain sari cheeze ki kaise kitni buyleads milenge jaise aapne ye consume kiya hai organic turmeric powder ke liye.
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: Aap haan aaj hi aapne dekha tha to iska order value 1600 se 1700 ka tha packaging size 500 gram wala. To ye aapne consume kiya hai to isi tarike se na aapko buyleads ka balance diya jata hai jaise ki 17 buyleads ye sari cheeze aapko welcome call mein samjhai jati hain.
Customer: Achha achha madam matlab aapka process kab tak khatam hoga ye process matlab?
Executive: Abhi process aapka start ho gaya hai sir consume. Ek minute sir.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ah, ye process aapka na start ho gaya hai to abhi agar sir free hai to main aapko na ye Google Meet ka link send kar rahi hun main aapko samjha de rahi hun kaise kaise platform work karta hai to join kariye aapko apna IndiaMART ka app jo hai application open karke screen share karna rahega taki main aapko wo sari cheeze guide kar dungi kaise kaise use karna hai.
Executive: Theek hai?
Customer: Bhej dijiye, bhej dijiye.
Executive: Ji aapke ye registered email ID pe send karu?
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji, chaliye.
Executive: Line pe rahiye, line pe send kar rahi hun.
Executive: Sir phone se join karenge ya laptop se?
Customer: Ah phone se karunga.
Executive: Apan ja vyaktishi bolat aahat tyanni aapla call hold var thevla aahe. Krupaya line var raha. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Krupaya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Apan ja vyaktishi bolat aahat tyanni aapla call hold var thevla aahe. Krupaya line var raha. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Krupaya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Apan ja vyaktishi bolat aahat tyanni aapla call hold var thevla aahe. Krupaya line var raha. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Krupaya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Apan ja vyaktishi bolat aahat tyanni aapla call hold var thevla aahe. Krupaya line var raha. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Krupaya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Apan ja vyaktishi bolat aahat tyanni aapla call hold var thevla aahe. Krupaya line var raha. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Krupaya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer says requirements started coming.

- Customer asks when the process will be completed.



Resolution:

- Executive explains about welcome call process.

- Executive offered to send Google Meet link.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to send Google Meet link.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, welcome call, catalog, google meet
